location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: File 791/1904 Pt 2 'Orders-in-Council: Persian Coast and Islands; application of the Indian Limitation Act to Persian Coast and Islands; revision of rules of court with Table of Fees'

mods.abstract: Part 2 contains the revised Rules of Court to cover the Table of Fees proposed under the 1907 Persian Coast and Islands Order in Council (folios 119-122). It also contains correspondence between the India Office and the Foreign Office on the application of the 1908 Indian Limitation Act to the Persian Coast and Islands.
